channel.title: I got this when i brought up my compiler and typed r to run
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:30)[/code]
how do i fix it

item.title: I got this when i brought up my compiler and typed r to run
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:12, topic:73874”]Hmmm, I can’t see what’s the problem. Almost everything is same as on my source, but the itemHandler = new ItemHandler(); is on line 28 on my server.java. Put it to line 28 and hope it works xD. (I doubt it)[/quote]can u check again plz cause i edited my post
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 10:03:25 PM[/size][hr]ooo dang im so smart i just fixed it it had nothing to do with wat u guys said lol

Read full topic
